mapper.select: SELECT p.projectNo, b.brandNo, b.brandName, p.projectName, c.categoryName, p.projectImageUrl, NVL(totalAmount,0) totalAmount, NVL(TRUNC(totalAmount/p.projectGoalAmount*100,1),0) percentage FROM project p JOIN brand b ON b.brandNo = p.brandNo JOIN project_category c ON c.categoryNo = p.categoryNo LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT projectNo, NVL(SUM(totalAmount) OVER(PARTITION BY projectNo), 0) - NVL(SUM(canceledAmount) OVER(PARTITION BY projectNo),0) totalAmount ,NVL(SUM(totalAmount) OVER(PARTITION BY projectNo), 0) investedAmount, NVL(SUM(canceledAmount) OVER(PARTITION BY projectNo),0) canceledAmount FROM reward_buy_overview ro LEFT OUTER JOIN reward_buy_cancel rc ON rc.buyNo = ro.buyNo ) total ON total.projectNo = p.projectNo WHERE p.statusNo in (5, 6) ORDER BY totalAmount DESC FETCH FIRST 5 ROWS ONLY

SELECT p.projectNo, b.brandNo, b.brandName, p.projectName, c.categoryName, p.projectImageUrl, NVL(totalAmount,0) totalAmount, NVL(TRUNC(totalAmount/p.projectGoalAmount*100,1),0) percentage FROM project p JOIN brand b ON b.brandNo = p.brandNo JOIN project_category c ON c.categoryNo = p.categoryNo LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT projectNo, SUM(totalAmount) OVER(PARTITION BY projectNo) totalAmount FROM reward_buy_overview ro LEFT OUTER JOIN reward_buy_cancel rc ON rc.buyNo = ro.buyNo WHERE rc.cancelNo IS NULL ) total ON total.projectNo = p.projectNo WHERE p.statusNo in (5, 6) ORDER BY percentage DESC FETCH FIRST 5 ROWS ONLY

SELECT ROWNUM, r.* FROM ( SELECT p.brandNo,brandName, COUNT(projectNo) projectAmount, memberImageUrl, managerName, managerEmail FROM brand b LEFT JOIN ( SELECT memberImageUrl, memberNo FROM member_detail ) md ON b.memberNo = md.memberNo JOIN project p ON b.brandNo = p.brandNo WHERE statusNo = 5 OR statusNo=6 GROUP BY p.brandNo,brandName, memberImageUrl, managerName, managerEmail ORDER BY projectAmount DESC )r WHERE ROWNUM <= 5
